### 代码
```{r}
game <- function(x) {
  # 色子游戏开始，任意取一个数 x
  s <- sample(1:6, 1)   # 从 1 至 6 中抽样，抽出一个数
  m <- s / 3 - s * 2    # 对抽样的数进行四则运算
  if (x > m)            # 当 x > m
    "win!!"             # 获胜
  else if (x < m)       # 当 x < m
    "lose!!"            # 失败
  else                  # 当 x = m
    "draw!"             # 平局
}
```
```{r}
game <- function(x) {   # 转盘游戏
  switch(x,             # 任意选取一个数
    "A" = "Nothing",
    "B" = "Reward,you have a chance to draw",
    "C" = "Oh my god,the ultimate prize",
    "D" = "Nothing,but you may want to sing",
    "E" = "Let's dance together",
    "Drinking!!!"
  )
}
```
